name: DVDStyler Project File
summary: Learn about .DVDS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DVDStyler projects are saved by default with the .XML extension, but may also use the ".dvds" extension.

description: XML project file created by DVDStyler, a DVD authoring tool; contains all information required to burn a DVD, including the DVD menus, background graphics, and aspect ratio; also stores references to the video files that will be burned to the disc.
